commands.help.success.base.title: Help Menu
commands.help.success.base.author.name: %client_username%
commands.help.success.no_args.fields.set: Setup and settings such as `/connect` or `/disable`
commands.help.success.no_args.fields.inf:
**All commands in a category** can be viewed with: **/help <category>**
**Still need help?** => [Support Discord Server](%invite_link%)
commands.help.success.category.fields.in:
**More info about a command** can be viewed with: **/help <command>**
**Still need help?** => [Support Discord Server](%invite_link%)
commands.help.success.disabled.descripti:
You can find helpful information here.
```diff
- [COMMAND DISABLED]```

commands.loadingscreen.success.descripti: %emoji_success% Here's your Minecraft loading screen! Make sure to put it in: `<resourcepack>/assets/minecraft/textures/gui/title/`

commands.chatchannel.warnings.no_permiss: %emoji_no_entry% This command can only be used by admins.
commands.chatchannel.warnings.no_text_ch: %emoji_warning% Please mention a text, thread or news channel.
commands.chatchannel.errors.could_not_wr: %emoji_error% Couldn't save channel. Please try again.
commands.chatchannel.warnings.not_author: %emoji_warning% Only the command sender can select message types.
commands.chatchannel.warnings.not_collec: Select all message types you want the bot to send. (Time ran out)
commands.chatchannel.warnings.already_re: Select all message types you want the bot to send. (Already responded)
commands.chatchannel.success.choose.desc: Select all message types you want the bot to send. (You have 20 seconds to select)
commands.chatchannel.success.choose.comp: Send a message every time a player chats.
Send a message every time a player joins the server.
Send a message every time a player leaves the server.
Send a message every time a player completes an advancement.
Send a message every time a player dies.
Send a message every time a player executes a command.
Send a message every time the server starts up.
Send a message every time the server shuts down.
commands.chatchannel.success.final.title: Set Chat Channel
%emoji_no_entry% This command can only be used by admins.
commands.connect.warnings.no_credentials: Please specify your ftp credentials! Use `/help connect` for more information!
commands.connect.warnings.invalid_port.d: %emoji_warning% Please specify a port that is bigger than 0 and smaller than 65536.
commands.connect.warnings.no_ip.title: No IP Specified
commands.connect.warnings.no_username.de: %emoji_warning% Please specify your minecraft java-edition account name.
commands.connect.warnings.invalid_method: %emoji_warning% Method **%method%** is not a valid connection method.
commands.connect.warnings.user_pinged.de: %emoji_warning% Don't ping someone. Specify your **minecraft java-edition account name** instead.
commands.connect.warnings.version_below_: %emoji_warning% The advancement command might not work because advancements don't exist in your minecraft version yet.
%emoji_warning% The stat and advancement commands might not work because stats and advancements don't exist in your minecraft version yet.
commands.connect.warnings.connecting.des: Connecting to ftp... (Can take up to one minute)

Please check the console of your minecraft server and enter the verification code from the server console below this message.

data.advancements.long_description: Look up your and other member's unlocked/completed recipes/advancements. You can find a list of all advancement (ids) [here](https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Advancement#List_of_advancements).
data.advancements.short_description: Look up your and other member's minecraft advancements.
data.advancements.options.story.name: story
data.advancements.options.story.descript: The heart and story of the game
Set the user you want to get the advancement from.
data.advancements.options.nether.name: nether
data.advancements.options.nether.options: Set the user you want to get the advancement from.
data.advancements.options.end.name: end
data.advancements.options.end.options.us: Set the user you want to get the advancement from.
data.advancements.options.adventure.name: adventure
data.advancements.options.adventure.opti: Set the user you want to get the advancement from.
data.advancements.options.husbandry.name: husbandry
data.advancements.options.husbandry.desc: The world is full of friends and food
data.advancements.options.husbandry.opti: Set the user you want to get the advancement from.
data.inventory.name: inventory
data.inventory.long_description: Get an image of the current player's inventory.
data.inventory.short_description: Get an image of the current player's inventory.
data.inventory.options.user.name: user
data.inventory.options.user.description: Set the user you want to get the inventory from.
data.stats.name: inventory
data.stats.long_description:
Look at your and other member's minecraft server stats.
All Categories (ids) can be found in this [Website](https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Statistics#Statistic_types_and_names)!
All stats of the `custom` category can be found [here](https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Statistics#Statistic_types_and_names).
data.stats.short_description: Look at your and other member's minecraft server stats.
data.stats.example: /stats @Lianecx mined iron_ore **//** /stats @Memer custom play_time **//** /stats xXgamerboyyXx killed blaze
data.stats.options.custom.name: custom
data.stats.options.custom.description: A multitude of generic statistics related to a player's actions.
data.stats.options.custom.options.stat.d: Set a custom stat. All stats of the custom category => /help stats
data.stats.options.custom.options.user.d: Set the user you want to get the stats from.
data.stats.options.mined.name: mined
data.stats.options.mined.description: Statistic related to the number of blocks a player mined.
data.stats.options.mined.options.user.de: Set the user you want to get the stats from.
data.stats.options.broken.name: broken
data.stats.options.broken.description: Statistics related to the number of items a player ran their durability negative.
data.stats.options.broken.options.user.d: Set the user you want to get the stats from.
data.stats.options.crafted.name: crafted
data.stats.options.crafted.description: Statistics related to the number of items crafted, smelted, etc.
Set the user you want to get the stats from.
data.stats.options.used.name: used
data.stats.options.used.description: Statistics related to the number of block or item used.
data.stats.options.used.options.user.des: Set the user you want to get the stats from.
data.stats.options.picked_up.name: picked_up
data.stats.options.picked_up.description: Statistics related to the number of dropped items a player picked up.
data.stats.options.picked_up.options.use: Set the user you want to get the stats from.
data.stats.options.dropped.name: dropped
data.stats.options.dropped.description: Statistics related to the number of items that dropped.
Set the user you want to get the stats from.
data.stats.options.killed.name: killed
data.stats.options.killed.description: Statistics related to the number of entities a player killed.
data.stats.options.killed.options.user.d: Set the user you want to get the stats from.
data.stats.options.killed_by.name: killed_by
data.stats.options.killed_by.description: Statistics related to the times of a player being killed by entities.
data.stats.options.killed_by.options.use: Set the user you want to get the stats from.

data.ban.short_description: Ban a player from the minecraft server.

data.loadingscreen.options.url.name: url
data.loadingscreen.options.url.descripti: Set the URL of the image you want to convert.
data.message.name: message
data.message.long_description: Send private chat messages to members on the server. Color codes can be found [here](https://minecraft.fandom.com/wiki/Formatting_codes#Color_codes).
data.message.short_description: Send private chat messages to members on the server.
data.message.options.user.name: user
data.message.options.user.description: Set the user you want to send a (private) message to.
data.message.options.message.name: message
data.message.options.message.description: Set the (private) message you want to send to the user.
data.text.name: text
data.text.long_description:
Create images with text with different fonts and colors. All color ids can be found [here](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/color_value#color_keywords).
**Special fonts**: `varela_round`, `minecrafter`, `mojang`, `minecraft`
data.text.short_description: Create images with text with different fonts and colors.
data.text.example: /text minecraft red I love this bot!
data.text.options.font.name: font
data.text.options.font.description: Set a font for your text.
data.text.options.color.name: color
data.text.options.color.description: Set the color for your text.
data.text.options.text.name: text
data.chatchannel.name: chatchannel
data.chatchannel.long_description: Setup a channel in which the bot will send minecraft chat messages and logs.
data.chatchannel.short_description: Setup a channel in which the bot will send minecraft chat messages and logs.
data.chatchannel.options.channel.name: channel
data.connect.name: connect
data.connect.long_description:
Connect your minecraft java-edition server or minecraft java-edition account with your bot. Connection methods are:
-ftp (also includes sftp)
-plugin
-account
**You can download the plugin using [this link](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/smp-plugin.98749/).**
data.connect.short_description: Connect your minecraft server or account with the bot.
data.connect.example:
/connect account Lianecx **//**
/connect plugin serverIp **//**
/connect ftp host username password port 1.17
data.connect.options.ftp.name: ftp
data.connect.options.ftp.description: Connect your Minecraft server using ftp/sftp.
data.connect.options.ftp.options.passwor: Set the ftp-password (`none` if no password).
data.connect.options.plugin.name: plugin
data.connect.options.plugin.description: Connect your Minecraft server using ftp/sftp.
data.connect.options.plugin.options.port: Set the port of the plugin from the config.yml
data.connect.options.account.name: account
data.connect.options.account.description: Connect your Minecraft server using ftp/sftp.
data.disable.name: connect
data.disable.example: /disable commands txp **//** /disable stats picked_up **//** /disable advancements adventuring_time **//** /disable list commands
data.disable.options.commands.name: commands
data.disable.options.commands.options.co: Set the command you want to disable
data.disable.options.advancements.name: advancements
data.disable.options.advancements.option: Set the advancement you want to disable
data.disable.options.stats.name: stats
Set the stat you want to disable
data.disable.options.list.name: list
data.disable.options.list.description: Get a list of all disabled stats/advancements/commands
data.disable.options.list.options.catego: Set the category which you want to list
data.disconnect.name: disconnect
data.disconnect.long_description: Disconnect your minecraft java-edition server or minecraft java-edition account from the bot and delete all saved credentials. To connect again, use `/connect`.
data.disconnect.short_description: Disconnect your minecraft server or minecraft account from the bot.
data.disconnect.options.ftp.name: ftp
data.disconnect.options.plugin.name: plugin
data.disconnect.options.account.name: account
data.enable.name: enable
data.enable.long_description: Enable a disabled command/stat/advancement (They're all enabled by default). Command-enabling is also possible through buttons in /help <command>.
data.enable.short_description: Enable a disabled command/stat/advancement (All enabled by default)
data.enable.example: /enable commands txp **//** /enable stats picked_up **//** /enable advancements adventuring_time
data.enable.options.commands.name: commands
data.enable.options.commands.options.com: Set the command you want to enable
data.enable.options.stats.name: stats
data.enable.options.stats.options.stat.d: Set the stat you want to enable
data.enable.options.advancements.name: advancements
data.enable.options.advancements.options: Set the advancement you want to enable
